title: 100% Pure Flax Linen Blanket (Red)
features: Sofia's Linen's newest product has arrived. Our 100% linen throw blanket offers the comfort and design suitable for every part of your home. With the versatility of its double -sided weave, it will complement every interior beautifully. This ultra-soft and pleasant fabric gives you all the benefits of pure linen while helping you enjoy deep and relaxing sleep on your bed, sofa, or favorite patio chair.
Has been shown to promote deep and relaxing sleep
Thermo-regulating - warm in winter, cool in summer
